  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_114693</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_114693</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Optical fibre glass and its refractive index</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optisches Fiberglas und sein Brechungsindex</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fibre de verre optique et son indice de 
réfraction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vidro da fibra ótica e seu deslocamento 
predeterminado refractive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vetroresina ottica ed il relativo indice di 
rifrazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γυαλί οπτικών ινών και το διαθλαστικό ευρετήριό του</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cristal de la fibra óptica y su índice de 
refracción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a cross-section of an optical fibre and its corresponding refractive index profile. The refractive index changes abruptly at the interface between the core and cladding.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cladding</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">coating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">core</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optical fibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refractive index profile</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Querschnitt einer 
optischen Faser und seines entsprechenden Brechungsindex Profils. 
Der Brechungsindex ändert unerwartet an der Schnittstelle 
zwischen dem Kern und der Umhüllung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une section transversale 
d'une fibre optique et de son profil correspondant d'indice de 
réfraction. L'indice de réfraction change abruptement à 
l'interface entre le noyau et le revêtement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um cross-section de uma 
fibra ótica e de seu perfil de deslocamento predeterminado refractive
correspondente. O deslocamento predeterminado refractive muda 
abruptamente na relação entre o núcleo e o cladding.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una sezione 
trasversale di una fibra ottica e del relativo profilo corrispondente 
di indice di rifrazione. L'indice di rifrazione cambia 
bruscamente all'interfaccia fra il nucleo ed il rivestimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια διατομή μιας οπτικής 
ίνας και του αντίστοιχου σχεδιαγράμματος διαθλαστικών ευρετηρίων 
της. Το διαθλαστικό ευρετήριο αλλάζει απότομα στη 
διαπροσωπεία μεταξύ του πυρήνα και της επένδυσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una sección 
representativa de una fibra óptica y de su perfil correspondiente del
índice de refracción. El índice de refracción cambia 
precipitadamente en el interfaz entre la base y el revestimiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umhüllung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optische Faser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brechungsindex Profil</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fibre optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fibra ottica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">profilo di indice di rifrazione</string>
          </keyword>
